nodes.text:
The Copy and Fax Room smells like warm plastic and old approvals. (pause)
A copier hums as if it’s being paid by the minute. (pause)
On the wall: a service-code sticker stack. Layered like sediment. (pause)
A fax machine displays LOW TONER with the confidence of a verdict. (pause)
A shelf of binder supplies sits within reach. Technically. (pause)
Hotspots: Copier control panel. Service code sticker stack. (pause)
Fax machine tray. Binder supplies shelf.
